name: Extreme Knife Flip Challenge
description:
Get ready for highly addictive Extreme Knife Flip Challenge in a realistic forest environment. Test your knife flipping skills and get engaged in beautifully designed impossible throw knife challenge using the best flipping knives or axes to become a great master. Expertly utilize sufficient force to stick the knife in the stump using highly advanced knife simulator. In Extreme Knife Flip Challenge, you will need to throw the flip flop knife in right direction with absolute accuracy along with speed for climbing the trees or jumping over shelves and collecting treasure bags.

How to play:

- Start the game
- Select the desired knife flip mode :

1- Arcade mode with amazing throw knife levels.
2- Combo mode with extremely challenging knife flipping levels.

- Choose from famous flipping knives & huge Viking axes for epic strikes.
- Place & drag the finger to right direction along with a loop to make precise hits.
- Throw famous knives, axes with twisted throws & loops, so that it rebounds back on the stump.

Features of Extreme Knife Flip Challenge:

- Realistic & stunning arcade simulator based colorful graphics!
- Quality sounds & rebound effects!
- Multiple Funny & challenging puzzle levels!
- Highly addictive knife simulator game based game play mode!

So what are you waiting for! Prepare yourself to download this game to unlock lots of fun waiting for you.
